author: Chris Clark
comment: Update. I eventually got it working and it's fantastic.  Great watch face.

reply.author: FruitieX
reply.content:
Odd. It has worked for everyone else so far. Would you like an .APK for free to test again with? Contact me via e-mail if you're interested.

Edit: Good to hear you got it to work. Android Wear sometimes is fiddly with app installs. Hope you like the watch face! :)

title: Doesn't work
